title: The impossible happened
body: I had a Yasuo in a ranked game who didn't feed, not only didn't flame, but was nice and chill and even carried. I've scheduled an MRI scan and an appointment with a psychiatrist for next week. There is something seriously wrong with my head, wish me luck guys.

replies.body: Feel free to submit a player support ticket.
Well great I woke up my roommate laughing at this.  Hope you're happy.
As happy as can be until my next ranked game.
ok. i normally dont think riot employees are cool but you just earned the cool title
Thank you. I'll ping this to my fridge so my mom can see this.

#Hmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm...
https://i.imgur.com/po6A6fl.png

Wait
That's illegal
https://youtu.be/zHC3uvzcfV0
https://i.imgflip.com/1mero0.jpg?a430824
That is one hairy.. chin.

https://i.imgur.com/DVREGaO.png
pigs are flying it seems
https://youtu.be/NGuphRLCL-M?t=49
People ask why I have Yasuo mains on my friends list and my response is always "Do you know how rare friendly Yasuo players are? Gotta catch em all!"
A glitch in Matrix for sure
Dude I met one of those toooooo. He said "Thank you"... I lost my mind.

I have a similar story that, when I tell it to my veteran mates (me and my cousin for example play now since 9 solid years!), we all have to "WOW".

There was this very bad Kayn player. His ganks were bad, he died to jungle creeps and well, he was someone you rather wish would disconnect. As Kayn players were so incredibly "toxic" before (not sure what the target group is? Very young male Naruto watchers?) and I am Bard Bard which means I do not talk in ghetto language to reflect my visuals. I kindly said that his skills might leave much to be desired and he just said:

_**"Yes, I suck with this champ. I can not play him, I don't like him and I will never play him again. Sorry! I will do my best but after that I will never touch im again."**_

I cried in joy. Every word was right and true. This person was the first that I met since my 9 years that was really aware of it without "no u suckz" or "play challengerzzz men". 

EDIT: He was not devastated btw. Nobody flamed him. It was just a sincere guy, honest to the bones but looking forward to a champ he might like more.
What are you on, and are you sharing?

Yikes dude
Are you sure you weren't transported to some bizarro universe?

Hey, ya trollin'us brah?

We all know that Yasuos don't do that shit.
THERE'S NO HOPE FOR YOU, CHECK INTO A MADHOUSE

y btw.. just ago, i played a game as zyra "support" that, we were against a rammus... properly fed maokai.. zed.. (and a trolling tristana for she lost the lane hard)

that yasuo kited , tanked, even wasted his ult to keep me alive so we could beat the raid bosses..  which we eventually did btw xd
https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/991/329/1e7.jpg

When I play Yasuo I always do my best to be kind. It blows some peoples' minds.

That being said I'm only Mastery 6. Who knows what'll happen if I ever reach Mastery 7?

when you reach mastery 7 you start getting an odd feeling of greatness and you start seeing yourself entitled on everyone,
you become angry, thicc headed and your decision making mechanism in your head starts to malfunction.
because of your non-stop anger you become triggered by even the tiniest things and start to lose your mind gradually.

it's really a tragic, tragic disease..

Upvote for potential oldCHAN meme.

If I could I would but I didn't upvote again via proxy because Riot.
That would just be silly.
so the legends are true?!
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

This should be in memes & games.

/s

This just in: players don't randomly flame for no reason when the game isn't going badly or they aren't even feeding.

More news at 11
sounds like FoxNews to me...

So yasuo has the ability to always be viable in lane, even when he feeds, he essentially can get 3 shields (passive, bloodthirster + phantom dancer) with a windwall. Hes not an auto feeder, so congrats on getting one of the good ones!
*for the future* if you see a yasuo in your game, easiest way to start their snowball is to roam and gank. I'll even roam as a support to help. 300-450g on him is incredible.

Yasuo dosent take phantom dancer anymore His passive falls off late (yes I know it scales bet its more usefull early) and the reason he builds steraks and bloodthirster is because he breaks like glass late game even with those items.
